GSP33yasasi_u:7: (vyākhyā) īṣṭe viśvasya nityaṃ vyapagatatulanāyogyavastvantaro yo vidye yasyādhigatyai vidurupaniṣado dve parāṃ cāparāṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:8: yo viśvasvāntavāsī prathayati ca dhiyaṃ tasya tasyānurūpāṃ devaḥ śrīmān sa mahyaṃ pradiśatu dayayā dhīvikāsaṃ samantāt // 1 //
GSP33yasasi_u:16_0: advaitino hisadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyamiti kāraṇībhūtasya sacchabditasya
GSP33yasasi_u:22: yadvā uttarārdhe tacchadbaḥ prasiddhaparāmarśī na tu yacchabdanirdiṣṭapratinirdeśarūpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:33: anyatve sadṛśatve vā dvitīyaṃ sidhyati dhruvam // 4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:34: advitīyapadasya tatpuruṣavṛttatve na dvitīyasya bādha ityāhapūrvasmin ityādinā ślokacatuṣṭayena /
GSP33yasasi_u:35: tatpuruṣa iti prathamakalpe tāvaduttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:39: nañtatpuruṣe cāropitatvasya pūrvapadārthatvaṃ tasya cottarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvamiṣyate śābdikaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:42: nañivayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagatiriti ca śābdikānāṃ paribhāṣā /
GSP33yasasi_u:43: tathā cādvitīyapadenāropitadvitīyatvavadbrahmeti bodhe tatra dvitīyānyatvasya dvitīyasadṛśatvasya dvitīyaviruddhatvasya vā pratītiḥ phalati /
GSP33yasasi_u:45: dvitīyapratiyogikasya bhedasya sādṛśyasya vā pratibodhane pratiyogitayā dvitīyasiddherniṣpratyūhatvāditi bhāvaḥ // 3 //4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:46: viruddhatve dvitīyena tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:48: nanvevamapi dvitīyaviruddhatve brahmaṇo bodhite kathaṃ na dvitīyasya bādha ityatrāhaviruddhatvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:51: sa ca dharmaḥ prathamatvaṃ niyamataḥ tṛtīyatvādi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:71: tato 'nyattadviruddhaṃ vā sadṛśaṃ vātra vakti saḥ // 8 //
GSP33yasasi_u:96: viśeṣaṇe vā tadbrahma tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā // 11 //
GSP33yasasi_u:106: tṛtīyaṃ tadabhāvatvaviśeṣaṇamiti prathamatvaṃ tṛtīyatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo 'varjanīyamityuttarārdhārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:109: brahmaṇaḥ prathamā ye ca tṛtīyādyā jagatrtraye // 12 //
GSP33yasasi_u:111: kiñca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati // 13 //
GSP33yasasi_u:118: nāsti dvitīyaṃ yasya tadbrahmetyatra pakṣe vigrahaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:120: tathā ca brahmaṇa eva dvitīyatvaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:121: tataśca brahmāpekṣayā prathamasya tṛtīyādeśca na bādho 'dvitīyaśrutyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:128: dvitve ca yacchabdārthasya brahmaṇo niṣṭhatvasaṃbandhonānvayo nopeyate;
GSP33yasasi_u:132: yato brahmaṇo bhinnaṃ nāsti tadbrahmādvitīyamiti dvitīyabādho 'dvitīyaśrutyā labhyata evetyatrāhakiñceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:141: yasyeti ṣaṣṭhī prakṛtyarthānviter'thāntarasaṃbandhe prāmāṇike sati saṅgacchate /
GSP33yasasi_u:142: nirviśeṣe ca brahmaṇi prakṛtyarthe padārthāntarasaṃbandhasyāsatyatvāt ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhiśca prakṛte na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:146: rāhoḥ śira ityādāvabhede 'pi ṣaṣṭhyā dṛṣṭeryadabhinno dvitīyābhāvastadadvitīyaṃ brahmeti vivakṣāṃ pratikṣepati,dvitīyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:147: asataḥ satpadārthābhedastadviśeṣaṇatvamapi na yujyate iti bhāvaḥ // 15 //
GSP33yasasi_u:171: prathamato brahmaṇo gaṇane kṛte tena saha gaṇanārhe dvitīyaḥ samo vādhiko vā padārthaḥ kālatraye 'pi nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:178: tathā cānugṛhītaṃ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śrīmadvedāntadeśikacaraṇaiḥasmatpakṣe tu vṛttidvayamapi samyak /
GSP33yasasi_u:184: mukhyasyaiva prathamaparigaṇanasya loke śāstre ca dṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:185: kavikulagaṇanāprasaṅge kālidāsasyaiva hi prāthamyena gaṇanaṃ kavilokaprasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:192: samasyaiva dvitīyagaṇanāyogyatvamityāśayamūlakaṃ capurā kavīnāmitiślokasyottarārdhaṃ paripaṭhyate adyāpi tattulyakaverabhāvādanāmikā sār'thavatī babhūvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:193: tathā ca bahuvrīhivṛttyā samaniṣedhaḥ phalati brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:194: muktānāmapi bhogamātrasāmyamiti na brahmaṇā saha gaṇanaṃ mukhyaparigaṇanaprastāve yuktam /
GSP33yasasi_u:195: tanmukhyaṃ vastu vastuto brahmaikameveti advitīyatvaṃ tasya pratitiṣṭhatīti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:197_0: na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate iti śrutyantarānusārātna tvatsamo 'styabhyadhikaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:197_1: kuto 'nyo lokatraye 'pyapratimaprabhāva ityupabṛṃhaṇānusārāccaidamarthyameva tasya nyāyyamiti hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:199: colanṛpasyāsthānapaṇḍitaṃ vijityavādāhaverājāsanaṃ rājyārdhaṃ ca tatsamarpitamadhigatavanta ime paramācāryāḥ pūrvāśrame /
GSP33yasasi_u:206: tā veṣṇavamahāvibhūtyarṇavaviśīryamāṇa jalakaṇikāyamānāḥ tadadvitīyatvaśrutyā na bādhyanta iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:207: aupaniṣadaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ brahma śrīmannārāyaṇa eveti ca viṣṇoriti nirdeśena jñāpitam //
GSP33yasasi_u:214: yathaika eva savitā na dvitīyo nabhaḥsthale /
GSP33yasasi_u:215: ityuktā na hi sāvitrā niṣidhyante 'tra raśmayaḥ // 24 //
GSP33yasasi_u:219: tatsvarūpāntargatasya tena saha gaṇanāyoga ityatredaṃ nidarśanam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:221: guṇasya guṇinā saha gaṇanāyoga ityatrayathā pradhāneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:226: saṅkhyeyadravyagaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyeyo 'nyaḥ padārtho yathā gaṇyate na tathā tadguṇabhūtā saṅkhyā tena saha gaṇyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:230: tathā, pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi /
GSP33yasasi_u:235: yathā brahmaguṇatvaṃ sidhyejjagataḥ tathaiva brahmāṃśatvaṃ pratipādayacchrutijātaṃ sarvaṃ jagata brahmāpṛthaksiddhaprakāratve vyavārthāpayadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:239: tathā, etāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyastaro hi saḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:246: mahimā ityanena jagato vibhūtitvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tiśayāvahatvādguṇatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:247: tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣa iti brahmaṇo jagadapekṣayātivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:248: ato na brahmasvarūpaikadeśatā mṛdaṃśateva tatpariṇāmaghaṭāderjagato yuktā /
GSP33yasasi_u:251: yatra viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi samanubhūyamāne 'nyatsvatantraṃ vastu na paśyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:254: sarvaprakārakaḥ sarvātmā paraṃ brahma paramapuruṣo nārāyaṇa eva bhūmā,
GSP33yasasi_u:256: svaniṣṭhaprañcadarśananindayā ca brahmaniṣṭhatvameva tasya gamyata ityāśayena śrutyantaramupādatte udaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:259: etasmin prapañce daramalpamapi antaramantarālaṃ brahmasaṃbandhavicchedaṃ yadā paśyati tadaivāsyaivaṃ jānataḥ saṃsārabhayamupasthitamagre bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:260: paraprakriyācchāyayaivamatrārtho vivakṣito bhedamithyātvaṃ na sidhyatyetadvākyata iti bodhanāya /
GSP33yasasi_u:261: paramātmani niṣṭhāśabditasya dhruvānusmaraṇasya pūrvavākyaprastutasyālpakālavicchede 'pi saṃsārabhayaprasaṅga eveti tu siddhāntisammator'thaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:268_0: nanu virukteṣu vacaneṣu brahmavibhūtitvādau jagataḥ pratipādite 'pi vacanāntareṣu
GSP33yasasi_u:268_1: kāraṇamātrasya satyatvam anyasya sarvasyāsatyatvaṃ ca pratīyate iti tadanurodheneṣāṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:273: vācā'sambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyamiti cchāndogye ṣaṣṭhaprapāṭhake /
GSP33yasasi_u:281: kena spṛṣṭamityākāṅkṣāyāṃntvetha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti pūrvaprakṛto mṛtpiṇḍo yogyatvātkartṛtayānveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:282: ghaṭatvādyavasthārūpo vikāraḥ tattadavasthāyogaprayuktaṃ ghaṭādināma ca mṛtpiṇḍenaiva gṛhītaṃ vākpūrvakavyavahārāyeti phalitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:283: evaṃ kāraṇadravyasyaiva nānāvasthābhāktvena nānākāryātmakatvātkāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānanyatvamityāhamṛttiketyeva satyamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:289: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñopapādanārthaṃ pravṛttatvādasya vākyasyopādānopādeyayorananyatva eva tātparyamuktadiśā /
GSP33yasasi_u:291: tathā sati sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvādeva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ syādityasaṅgatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:299: so 'yaṃ śarīrātmabhāvo jagadbrahmaṇoḥsadāyatanāḥ aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamiti nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:304: tadidameva prāmāṇikamiti cocyate etadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyamityekavākyatayānvayāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:306: paravyākhyācchāyayā tu tadbrahma satyaṃ sadaikarūpamityartho varṇitaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:312: pāpakādvyucca ritānāṃ visphuliṅgānāmagnyaṃśatvenāgnyananyatvavadbrahmaṇa udbhūtasya prapañcasyāpi brahmāṃśabhūtasya brahmānanyatvameva vivakṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:313: idaṃ cānanyatvaṃ mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca śrutiṣu nirūpitamiti yāvat // 30 //
GSP33yasasi_u:323: nanuuta tamādeśamaprākṣyoyenāśrataṃ śrutaṃ bhavatīti pratijñātamekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ brahmaṇa ekasyaiva pāramārthye ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:326_0: brahmaṇo nikhilajagadantarātmatvena nikhilajagatpradhānatayā nikhilasya ca taccharīratvena
GSP33yasasi_u:326_1: tatprakārataikasvarūpatayā tasmin jñāte tadanantargataṃ kimapi jñātavyaṃ mukhyaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:326_2: nāvaśiṣyata iti ekavijñānena sarvavijñāvākyasyārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:328: niruktārthaparaiḥ śrutivacanaistanmūlopabṛṃhaṇasmṛtivacanaiśca brahmātmakatvena labdhasvarūpaḥ prapañca ityeva bodhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:329: na tu brahmaṇo vibhūtibhūtaḥ sa niṣidhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:334: tatra ca ātmano lābhaḥ ātmalābhaḥ-svarūpasattā brahmatmatayā-brahmatmakatvena ātmalābho yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:335: brahmāvibhūtibhūtasya prapañcasya na niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ śāstreṣviti nirūpitametāvatā // 32 //33 //
GSP33yasasi_u:339: prapañcaniṣedhe vivakṣite śāstravacanataḥ tattadarthaviśeṣapratipādanopādānādyarthāḥ sarve vyavahārā laukikā vaidikāśca lupyeran-aprāmāṇikā visaṃvādinaśca bhaveyuḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:342: brahmabhinnasarvamithyātve brahmaviṣayakadhiya aupaniṣadyā apivilopo 'satyatā prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:346: nanu paramārthadṛṣṭyā brahmabhinnasya sarvasya mithyātve 'pi tataḥ prāk avidyātaḥ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārādi nirūhyata iti cettatrāhavyāvahāriketi /
GSP33yasasi_u:348: vyāvahārikasattayā pramāṇaprameyavyavahāropapādane vyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvena śrutyādinā janitā parabrahmabuddhirapi bhavatabhimatā vyāvahārikārthamātragocarā bhavet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:351: etadviṣaye pūrvācāryaiḥ sūribhireva parākrāntaṃ nitarāmiti visamyate 'treti bodhyam // 35 //
GSP33yasasi_u:362: nanu sattve prapañcasya nāstīti pratyayaḥ katham /
GSP33yasasi_u:363: asattve vā kathaṃ tasminnastīti pratyayo bhavet // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:365: atha tasya sadasadanirvacanīyatvamapi parābhimataṃ nirasituṃ vicāramupakramate nanu sattve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:366: sattve prapañcasya nāstīti bādhaviṣayatvaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭatetyākṣepo mādhyamikādīnām /
GSP33yasasi_u:368: asattve sadbuddhibodhyatvaṃ pratipannaṃ tasya kathaṃ ghaṭeteti // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:382: sadasattvayoḥ pratīyayormadhye ekasyaiva nirṇaye hetvabhāvādyathāpratīti prapañcasyobhayamevaiṣṭavyamiti janā āsthitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:395_1: ca viruddhaṃ dharmadvayaṃ parityajya na sat nāpyasaditi sadasadanirvacaniyaṃ prapañca
GSP33yasasi_u:400: vibhaktadeśakālādiviśeṣataḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca pratītaṃ vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāderghaṭata eveti bhāvo 'mīṣām // 42 //
GSP33yasasi_u:407: tatra pakṣāntarāṇāṃ sadoṣatvapratipādanapūrvakaṃ sopādhikasattvāsattvapakṣo mīmāṃsakābhimato nirṇīyate sadyuktyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:421: yadvā pratītiḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca nirūpādhi yadi pratyapādayiṣyat ,
GSP33yasasi_u:432: tataḥ siddhānte viśeṣaśca śatadūṣaṇyāṃ vyavriyata ṣaṣṭitame vāde śrīmannigamāntācāryacaraṇaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:440: iha tādātmyaṃ saṃsargo vā sattvamiti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:442: ṣaṣṭhe tu pakṣe viruddhadharmayoga eva vastunyasadvyavahārahetutayā vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:443: ghaṭo hi ghaṭātmanā san paṭātmanā punarasanniti nirdiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:449: tathā ayaṃ paṭo nāstītyatra paṭatādātmyābhāvalakṣaṇā paṭātmanāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:450: tatra tadā ghaṭo nāstītyatra ca taddeśakālasaṃyogābhāvalakṣaṇāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:453: yathā ghaṭatvameva hi ayaṃ ghaṭo 'stītyatra pratītaṃ ghaṭasya sattvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:455: evaṃ svadeśakālasaṃbandhalakṣaṇā sattaivānyadeśakālanāstitāpratītāvapi viṣayo bhavati deśāntarādisaṃbandhābhāvatveneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:456: tathā ca dharmaviśeṣa eva bhāvānāmastināstipratītigocara iti siddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:464: uktaṃ ca - ādāvante ca yannāsti nāsti madhye 'pi tattathā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:466: avirodhena sadasattvasamarthanasamahamānaḥ sattvaikāntyavādī kāpilo 'tra pratyavatiṣṭhate nanu deśādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:471: ataḥ sattvameva sadā mantavyaṃ bhāvānāmitisataḥ sattvaṃ sadā bhavedityantasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:474: asataḥ prayatnaśatenāpi niṣpattyā sattvaṃ durupapādaṃ sikatābhyastailasyeva /
GSP33yasasi_u:499: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca kārakacakrasya tasya tasya tatra tatra kārye sāmarthyaniyamaḥ sidhyatīti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:511: tacca pratītibādhābhyāṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvasiddheḥ supratiṣṭhitamiti hi māyāvādināṃ matam /
GSP33yasasi_u:516: nirviśeṣacinmātrabrahmātmaikyaṃ catattvamasivākyapratipannamiti vādamadvaitināṃ pratikṣeptuṃ tattvamasivākyārthavicāramupakramate śvetaketumiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:520: asyāpi samānādhikaraṇavākyasya mukhyārthatvaṃ tanmate na saṃbhavatītyahatasyetyādinā // 51 //
GSP33yasasi_u:529: samānavibhaktyā pratipannamaikyaṃ jīveśvarayorviruddhasvabhāvayorna ghaṭata iti mukhyārthāsaṃbhava evetyāśayaḥ // 52 //
GSP33yasasi_u:545: upalakṣaṇatve 'pi ajñatvādinopalakṣyasya jīvabhāvasya sarvajñatvādinopalakṣyasyeśvarabhāvasya ca vaiyadhikaraṇyādeva tvantadarthayoraikyaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ // 54 //
GSP33yasasi_u:550: yathā so 'yaṃ raurityatra tattedantopalakṣite vastumātre lakṣaṇā padadvayasya tatheti śaṅkate vācyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:551: vācyaikadeśasya pravṛttinimittabhedasya tyāgena viśeṣyamātre cinmātre padadvayasya vṛttiḥ jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:560: tattāviśiṣṭe idantānvayasya bādhe 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇyubhayānvaye na virodhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:563: prātipadikābhyāṃ deśadvayakāladvayasaṃbandhasya samānavibhaktyā tadāśrayadravyaikyasya ca pratipādane na virodhaleśo 'pi /
GSP33yasasi_u:568: na tvevaṃ bhavatā vaktuṃ śakyata ityāhasvaprakāśasyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:569: nirviśeṣe cinmātre viruddhadharmadvayasambandhasyāvirodhopapādakaṃ deśakālāvasthābhedādau kiñcidapi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:573: brahmaṇyavidyānvayāyogādevāvidyākṛtabhedadarśananirasanārthatvaṃ śāstrasya nirviśeṣacinmātra brahmātmaikyaviṣayatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ na saṃbhavītyāhanirdhūteti /
GSP33yasasi_u:576: na ca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe ca tatprasaktiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:586: cinmātre brahmaṇyavidyānvayānupapattiparyālocanayā kaiścidadvaitibhiḥ kalpitaṃ māyāvidyopādhibhedaṃ tata eveśeśitavyabhedaṃ cāparamārthamupapādyamānaṃ nirasyatieteneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:590: tattvamasivākyajanyaikyasākṣātkāreṇa māyāvidyopādhināśe tatkalpita īśajīvabhāvo 'pi nivṛtto nāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:596: aikyajñānena nivṛttyupagame 'pi tasya kṣaṇikatvādeva punarapi brahmasvarūpabalāttayoḥ kalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:597: kiñca māyāyā bhrāntijanakatve duḥkhādijanakatve cāvidyāto vibhāgāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:600: avidyāyā eva bahusaṃmatatvānmāyāvidyopādhibhedavādino 'mī kṣudrā brahmavido 'dvaitiṣviti ca bodhyam // 59 //60 //
GSP33yasasi_u:610: niraṃśe cinmātre māyāvidyāsambandhe tatprayuktasvabhāvabhedā ekasminneva prasajyante iti jīveśvarasvabhāvasāṅkaryaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:615: kiñca māyayāvidyayā vā saṃvitsvarūpasya cchedāsambhavādekameva tattadupahitaṃ bhavedgaganamiva maṭhāntavartighaṭena maṭhena copahitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:616: tathā ca hastapādādyavacchinnasukhaduḥkhabhoga ekasyaiva yathā jīvasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:617: tathā tattadupādhiprayuktaiśvaryaduḥkhādibhoga ekasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata iti jīvaparasvabhāvāvyavasthitirevetyarthaḥ // 61 //62 //
GSP33yasasi_u:618: taṭasthāvasthitā dharmāḥ svarūpaṃ na spṛśanti kim /
GSP33yasasi_u:622_0: tanniṣṭhasya sārvajñyāderajñatvādeśca daṇḍena kuṇḍalena vopahite kādācitkadaṇḍādiviśeṣaṇavattayā
GSP33yasasi_u:622_1: taṭasthaśabdite devadatte vartamānasya sukhasya duḥkhasya ca devadattātmanīva brahmaṇi
GSP33yasasi_u:637: brahmabhinnasyānātmatve tattvaṃpadadvayalakṣyārtha eka pratyaktatvaṃ cinmātramava śiṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:640: taccaekaśeṣe tu tādātmyaṃ cinmātre naiva sambhavet iti syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:646: atra yādavaprakāśaprakriyayā bhāṭṭaprakriyayā vā nirūpyate tādātmyamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:648: dharmadvārakabhedaviśiṣṭasvarūpābheda eva ca tādātmyaṃ matamiti vivekaḥ // 65 //
GSP33yasasi_u:658: antye ghaṭo ghaṭa itīti vā bhedābhedavikalpo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:660: atyantabhinnasyātyantābhinnasya vā bandhe - tādātmyasambandhe asati-aprāmāṇike sati bhavatkṛto 'yaṃ vikalpo 'pārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:661: na hi ghaṭo ghaṭa iti vā ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yasasi_u:665: na ca bhede tayorvirodhādekatra samāveśo na ghaṭata iti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:667: dharmato bhedaḥ svarūpato 'bheda iti vāvirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 66 //
GSP33yasasi_u:675: etayoḥ-bhedābhedayoḥ svarūpaṃ svarūpabhedamupagamyaiva bhedo 'bhedo veti vikalpakoṭyorbādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:686: antye asambaddhasya viśiṣṭabuddhinirvāhakatvaṃ tasya na syāditi vikalpanamapi kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātraphalakaṃ pratyakṣānubhavabādhitaṃ cetyarthaḥ // 69 //
GSP33yasasi_u:690: nīlarūpavati ghaṭādau nīlabuddhiryathā nīlasamavāyāvagāhinī viditā nāpalapyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:704: sphuṭapratipanne saṃyoge dustarkatanmūlavikalpanādi yathā bhramalakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātram ,
GSP33yasasi_u:706: evaṃ nīlotpalāditādātmye pratyakṣe jīvabrahmatādātmye ca śāstrasiddhe dustarkavikalpanādi pratyakṣaśāstradaṇḍanivāritamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:711: pravṛttinimittarūpadharmabhedena dharmisvarūpābhedena ca tādātmyaṃ tattvamasītyādau tvamādiśabdānāṃ tattaccharīrakabrahmaparyantatayā nirūpaṇīyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:716: ekaśeṣe hi ciddhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalaṃ bhavet // 74 //
GSP33yasasi_u:718: etāvatā paramate prātipadikayoriva samānavibhakterapi na mukhyārthateti vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:720: tathāpi pravṛttinimittadharmabhedaprahāṇānna sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatā paramata iti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:723: eṣa brahma praviṣṭo 'smi grīṣme śītamiva hradam itivacanānusāreṇa brahmānandasya hradatvarūpaṇam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:725: brahmānandaṃ hṛdantaḥstha iti pūrvamudritapāṭhastu na samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:727: paramaphale mokṣe bhoktṛtvāvasthāpannasya svasya vilayaṃ cejjānīyānnābhilaṣyettāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:734: cinmātrameva brahma jīvasya svarūpamiti cettarhi brahmaṇa evāvidyājīvabhāvādi vaktavyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:739: na hi tasyāmajātāyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ vākhilaṃ jagat /
GSP33yasasi_u:749: paṭajñānanāśe 'pi anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādibhedānāmupalambhānna paṭajñānāderapi prapañcādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:753: ghaṭādayo hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt // 77 //
GSP33yasasi_u:755: naivaṃ, ghaṭo hi nābhāti sā sphuratyeva tu sphuṭam // 78 //
GSP33yasasi_u:773: tasyātiriktatve tu paṭajñāne tadabhāne 'pi saṃvidobhānamakṣatameveti samuditāśayaḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:775: kiñcāsyāḥ svaprakāśāyā nīrūpāyā na hi svataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:788: na vastu vastudharmo vā na pratyakṣo na laiṅgikaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:808: pratyakṣeṇa bhedagrahaṇābhāvādeva tanmūlāvinābhāvagrahādhīnodayamanumānamapi na bhede pramāṇaṃ bhavediti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:819: kiñca svayaṃprakāśasya svato vā parato 'pi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:826: saṃvidaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo vā kiṃ tayaiva gṛhyate ?
GSP33yasasi_u:827: uta saṃvidantareṇeti vikalpya prathamaṃ kalpa pratikṣipatisvata iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:836: saṃvinnānātvopagame 'pi na tatprāgabhāvagrahasambhava ityabhyupagamya vādaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:850: so 'yaṃ saṃvidbhedāvalambī vikalpādivādaḥ saṃvitsvarūpayāthātmyājñānakārya ityadvaitino manyanta ityarthaḥ // 86 //
GSP33yasasi_u:855: śraddhāmātraśaraṇeṣu vineyabuddhiṣu nirūpaṇāsamartheṣu bhavadabhimato 'yaṃ brahmopadeśaḥ śobhate nāma /
GSP33yasasi_u:856: yuktivimarśakā vayaṃ tu nātra bhavadīye brahmopadeśe śraddhālavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:864: ekasminneva viṣaye kālabhedena karaṇabhedena ca dhiyo nānā pratyātmamadhyakṣasiddhāḥ sukhaduḥkhādivadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:868: na hi bhedaḥ svato nāsti nāpratyakṣaśca sammataḥ // 89 //
GSP33yasasi_u:869: nanu yathā nirbhede 'pyākāśe sambandhivyaṅgyo bhedo ghaṭākāśo 'yamayaṃ tu maṭhākāśa iti pratīyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:870: evaṃ saṃvidyapi viṣayāśrayavyaṅgyo bhedo na vāstava iti cettatrāhasambandhīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:872: sa tu kuḍyamusalasaṃyoga iti sambandhibhedenaiva vyāvṛttatayā pratīyamānaḥ saṃyogabhedo vāstava eva sambandhijanyatvāttasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:874: maitrasya paṭecchetyevaṃ sambandhibhedena bhinnatayā pratīyamānā bhinnabhinnaivecchā tattatpuruṣīyā tadā tadā jāyamānā,
GSP33yasasi_u:875: evaṃ viṣayāśrayabhedena pratīyamīnaḥ saṃvidbhedo 'pi vāstavika eva kālādibhedena jāyamāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:876: siddhānte tattatpuruṣe vartamānasya dharmabhutajñānasyaikatve nityatve 'pi tattadarthaprakāśanārthaprasaraṇāvasthābhedaviśiṣṭaveṣeṇa nānātvamanityatvaṃ ca saṃmataṃ,
GSP33yasasi_u:883: nityavibhunaḥ prakāśakasyaikasya jñānasya sarvaviṣayasambandhe samāne sadā sarvārthasya bhānaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:884: prakāśakajñānasambandhe 'pyabhāne tu kasyacidapi kadāpi bhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:893: siddhānte tu saṅkocavikāsābhyāṃ jñānasya viṣayabhede sannidhyasannidhī vyavasthite iti bodhyam // 91 //
GSP33yasasi_u:898: etatkaraṇajanyaṃ jñānametamevārthaṃ gṛhṇātītyevaṃ karaṇabhedenāpi vyavasthā durvacā bhavadbhirityāhanāpīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:905_1: eva caitanyaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ prakāśayatīti vyavasthā ghaṭata iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:911: nanu naḥ saṃvido bhinnaṃ sarvaṃ nāma na kiñcana /
GSP33yasasi_u:913: sarvasya sarvadā bhānaprasaṅgaṃ siddhāntinodbhāvitamākṣipati paraḥnanu iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:914: saṃvidbhinnasya sarvasya virahādevāsmanmate sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāditya sthānaṃ'nuyogo bhavatāmityarthaḥ // 94 //
GSP33yasasi_u:915: idamākhyāhi bhoḥ kiṃ nu nīlādirna prakāśate /
GSP33yasasi_u:916: prakāśamāno nīlādiḥ saṃvido vā na bhidyate // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:919: uta nīlādeḥ saṃvidabhinnatvena tatpratītiḥ saṃvitpratītirevābhimanyata ityarthaḥ // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:923: nānāpratītinihnive nānāpadapadārthapratītinirvāhyaḥ sarvo laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāraḥ pratītisubhagaḥ-abādhitānubhavasiddhaḥ samyaṅ nirvyūḍho bhavedbhavadbhirityupālambhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:935: bhinnatvenābhinnatvena vā nirūpayitumaśakyatvaṃ ca tasyā avidyāvilāsatvāt bhedābhedayoranirūpaṇaṃ yasyā bhedābhedānirūpaṇā /
GSP33yasasi_u:936: āvidyāsya nīlādibhedasya mithyātvāt mithyārthe ca durghaṭatvasya bhūṣaṇatvādbhedābhedānirūpaṇopapattiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:937: upapattyananuvartitvādeva ca sarvaṃ sadā bhāyādityādyāpatterapyanavakāśa iti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:941: avidyā hi nyāyānalaspṛṣṭā jātuṣavanna jīvituṃ prabhavati /
GSP33yasasi_u:953: tathā ca svayamevālabdhasattāvidyā kathaṃ prapañcavyavasthāpikā bhavedityākūtam /
GSP33yasasi_u:959: arthānarthāntaratvādivikalpo 'syā na yujyataiti vacanaṃvidyātor'thāntaramasāviti ca vacanaṃ mitho viruddhamiti yāvat // 99 //100 //
GSP33yasasi_u:968: tathā ca śuddhājaḍasaṃvidapekṣayā vikārāspadāśuddhajaḍāvidyāyā bheda eva paramārthataḥ kuto na nirūpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:969: tathā ca paramārthāvidyāvilāso bhedaḥ sarvo 'pi saṃvida ekasyā eva sakalārthaprakāśakatve sarvadā bhāseteti doṣastadavastha iti bhāvaḥ // 102 //
GSP33yasasi_u:971: sā vidyā kiṃ nu saṃvittirvedyaṃ vā veditāthavā // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:974: tatra pratiyogibhūtā vidyā kiṃrūpeti vikalpanaṃ vimarśanārtham // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:978: tatra vidyāyā vedyarūpatve veditṛsvarūpatve vā doṣamāhavedyatve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:988: divākarakaravyāpte deśe divākare vā tadvirodhino 'ndhatamasasyeva vibhvyā saṃvidā vyāpte sarvatra saṃvidi vā nāvidyāyāḥ samāveśasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:997: avidyāyā aparamārthatvena tadanāditve 'pi nāsmadabhimatādvaitoparodha iti cedatra bramaḥ-anāditvenopagamyamānāyā avidyāyāḥ kalpakadoṣāntarāyogenāpāramārthyāyogaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:998: brahmaṇa eva tatkalpakadoṣatve durghaṭatvena hetvantarānapekṣatve vā muktāvapi tatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1002: jīvasya, ko jīvo yasya seti cet /
GSP33yasasi_u:1008: na vidyate samādhānaṃ yasya tadasamādhānam - asamādheyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1010: tasmin siddha evāvidyāsiddhiriti jīvāvidyāpakṣe paramate 'nyonyāśrayo 'samādheyaḥ prasajatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1012: kintu bhavatāmeveti dyotyate te iti nirdeśena /
GSP33yasasi_u:1015: bījāṅkura nyāyena sa doṣaḥ parihārya ityatrāhane ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1019: brahmaṇaścenna sarvajñaṃ kathaṃ tat baṃbhramīti te(bhoḥ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1025: sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvathā yathāvasthitaṃ svataḥ sākṣātkurvatastasya nānāvidhabhrāntilakṣaṇāvidyāśrayatvaṃ viruddhatvānna sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1031: avidyāmūlāhaṅkāranibandhanatā ca brahmaniṣṭhasya sārvajñyasya na ghaṭate,
GSP33yasasi_u:1032: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ceti tasyānanyopādhikatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1050: te śabdāntarādayaḥ śāstrabhedakāḥ-tattadvidhivākyasya vibhinnavibhinnavidheyakatvena bhedavyavasthāpakāḥ bhedakapramāṇabhūtāstāntrikairmatāḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1052: tathā sarvajñatāpi pāramārthikārthabhedagocarā yathārthaiva kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ // 111 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1055: parabrahmaṇi parameśvare svataḥ sarvajñe 'vidyāyā asambhava uktaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1057_1: vindeta padaṃ gabhastimālinīvāndhatamasaṃ tarhi na tasyā nivartakamanyatkiñcidapi
GSP33yasasi_u:1066: tathā cāmananti sma parāśarabhaṭṭapādāḥetadrāmāstraṃ dalayatu kalibrahmamīmāṃsakāṃśca jñaptirbrahmaitajjavaladapi nijāvidyayā bambhramīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1067: tasya bhrāntiṃ tāṃ ślathayati jitādvaitavidyastu jīvo yadyaddṛśyaṃ tadvitathamiti ye jñāpayāñcakrurajñāḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1071: nanu bhedakapramāṇānāṃ sarvajñatvādivacanānāmapi vyāvahārikārthabhedagocarāṇāṃ vyāvahārikameva pramāṇyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1074: tatra jīveśvarādibhedo 'pyavidyayā vinānupapanna iti brahmāśritaiva sānāyatyā mantavyeti śaṅkate sarvajñatvādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1079: sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutīnāṃ ca sarvaśarīrakasarvātmabhūtabrahmaikyaparatvamiti na jīvabhāvādikalpikāvidyā brahmaṇyupagantavyeti ca hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1090: saditi sattāmātramekarasaṃ svaprakāśarūpaṃ brahma kathaṃ svaviṣayakāvidyāyatanaṃ bhavedākārabhedābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1093: brahmatvena viṣaya iti cedayaṃ rūpabhedaḥ kathamāyātastatra ?
GSP33yasasi_u:1096: svābhāviko 'yamiti tu na vaktuṃ śakyate saviśeṣatvabhiyā parairiti bhāvaḥ jīvāvidyāpakṣa ivātrāpyanyonyāśra iti punarityanena dyotyate // 114 //115 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1115: kiñcāvidyā na cet ... (vastu vyavahāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1116: nāpyavastviti co....... (ktau tu vastutvaṃ sidhyati dhruvam ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1119: ato na vastu nā... (vastu na sadvācyaṃ na cāpyasat ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1122: dṛśyamānaśakalānusandhānataḥ avidyāyā na vastutvaṃ nāpyavastutvamiti pakṣasya pratikṣepaḥ kṛto 'tretyunnayāmaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1128: avidyā sā kimekaiva naikā vā tadidaṃ vada //
GSP33yasasi_u:1129: tadāśrayaśca saṃsārī tathaiko naika eva vā // 122 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1137: śuko mukto, vāmadevo mukta iti khalu śrautīprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1138: tathā ca śukasya brahmavidyayaiva prapañcaheturekāvidyā vinaṣṭeti prapañcānuvṛttiranupapannā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1140: bādhitaṃ hi svayameva nivartsyati kañcitkālamanuvartamānamapīti bhāvaḥ // 123 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1169: svāvidyāparikalpitatvaṃ tava prapañcasya ca sādhayannanyastulyanayena tvayā kathaṃ pratikṣepya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1172: sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1173: ubhau ca yadi sarvajñau buddhibhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1174: iti nyāyena parasparavirodhādubhayamapi paramārthato na sidhyatīti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1175: yadvā sarveṣāṃ jñānā jīvānāmaikyasya siddhirivānyasya sarvasyaikāvidyākalpitatvasyāpi siddhirna setsyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1181: tvāṃ cānye tvadīyā eveti sundopasundanyāyaparāhataṃ yuṣmanmatamiti bhāvaḥ // 129 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1183: tathaiva bhavato 'pīti vyartho mokṣāya te śramaḥ // 130 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1195: tathā bhavatāṃ tataḥ paścādbhāvinyapi sā mithyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:1216: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadyapi muktirnityasiddhā brahmavidyayā notpādyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:1218: sata evāprakāśamānatvenāsata iva sthitasyābhivyaktyarthaḥ prayatno yathā loke saphalo dṛṣṭastatheti //
GSP33yasasi_u:1222: saṃvit kiṃ saiva kiṃ vāhaṃ brahmāsmītīti kīdṛśī /
GSP33yasasi_u:1231: iti kīdṛśī-ityevaṃ jijñāsitaprakārābrahmāsmītīti vṛttidhīriti vā pāṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1235: nanu te brahmavidyā sā saiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ katham // 140 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1238: na hi brahmavidyāsādhyaṃ prakāśāntaraṃ muktau bhavateṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1244: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktātmasvabhāvasyābhivyaktirvṛttirūpā cettasyā utpādavināśayogitvāttannivṛttau punaravidyā samunmiṣediti saṃsṛtibhayānativṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1245: nanu pūrvāvidyāṃ vināśya vidyā svayamapi naśyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1246: avidyānivṛttyā ca na punarbhavaprasaṅga iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:1247: atra brūmaḥ - anādibhāvasya nāśāyogāt tattvasākṣātkāreṇāvidyāyā nātyantikocchedaḥ śakyakriyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1248: sāvaśeṣocchede tu sūkṣmarūpeṇāvasthitāyāstasyā abhivyakternivṛttau punaḥ sthūlatayonmeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1249: na cānādibhāvarūpāyā api mithyātvādeva ātyantikocchedaḥ kriyate vidyayeti vācyam ,

GSP33yasasi_u:1823: ghaṭādṛte bhātātatpaṭādṛte bhānaṃ ghaṭasya yathā sidhyati ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1824: tathār'thaṃ vinābhātājjñānādvinā bhānasarthasya sidhyatīti sahopalambhaniyamo nanīladitaddhiyāṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1825_0: nanu jñānenaivārthaprakāśasya vācyatvājjñānasya ca svaprakāśatvājjñānabhānaṃ vinārṃ'thabhānaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1825_1: na yujyata iti cedevamapi sahopalambhaniyamo na yujyata eva jñānaviśeṣeṇa jñānasāmānyena vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1827: idamartha eva sahopalambhaniyama iti 197 tamaḥ ślokaḥ ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1829: evaṃ mitimātṛmeyabhidāyāthātmyaṃ na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti vyavasthāpi tamatreti dhyeyam // 207 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1833: prajñānidhirguruvaro mama bhūtapuryāṃ rāmānujārya urukīrtīrayaṃ samindhe //
GSP33yasasi_u:1835: aṇṇaṅgarārya iti ca prathitābhidhāno vyākhyābhimāmakaravaṃ prativādibhīkṛta gurupādaprasādena yāmunoktyarṇave tariḥ /
